Introduction
This topic contains information on developing for and determining permanent incapacity for self-support, including
when to send Section 5103 notice regarding the evidence required to establish permanent incapacity for self-support
determining if a VA examination is necessary to determine permanent incapacity for self-support
rating activity considerations in claims alleging a child’s permanent incapacity for self-support
deciding the issue of permanent incapacity for self-support
, and
scheduling reexaminations in rare cases involving a child’s permanent incapacity for self-support
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section B - A Child’s Permanent Incapacity for Self-Support
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section B
